mcq.statement: Choose the correct Direct speech: The traveler inquired to the farmer if he could tell him the way to the nearest inn?

options.a: The traveler said to the farmer, "Can you tell me where is the nearest inn?"
options.b: The traveler said to the farmer, "Can you tell me the way to the nearest inn?"
options.c: The traveler said to the farmer, "Which is the way to the nearest inn?"
options.d: The traveler said to the farmer, "Where is the nearest inn?"
